#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    unsigned long a,b;
    int r1,r2,s,r,cnt;
    cin>>a>>b;
    while(a || b)
    {
        r = 0;
        cnt=0;
        while(a || b)
        {
            r1 = a % 10;
            r2 = b % 10;
            s = r1 + r2 + r;
            r = s / 10;
            //cout<<r<<endl;
            if(r != 0)
                cnt++;
            a = a / 10;
            b = b / 10;
        }
        if(cnt==0)
            cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
        else if(cnt==1)
            cout<<cnt<<" carry operation."<<endl;
        else
            cout<<cnt<<" carry operations."<<endl;
        cin>>a>>b;
    }
    return 0;
}
